Wisekrakr Games

All the games that Wisekrakr Games© created

As a coder we need to experiment and the mind will keep making up new things to create. While I was learning to code, these were the games that came out of that process. Some are very simple, they all look rough, but a rising line of skill is unmistakingly visible.

Wisekrakr Games

The first game I ever created.

I just figured out how to use Intellij and what gradle was. I searched for a 2d library to help me (LibGDX) and this is what came out.

Nostalgia

I remembered playing a snake game on my Texas Instruments calculator when I was in high school. Now I can make it myself.

Give it some color

After these weak attempts at games I wanted more animations, more physics, more depth. This game is so deep, I forgot to put enemies in. Then again, it does have something fun to look at at least

The beauty is in its simplicity

I think every game developer tried to make this game at one time or another. Not to do anything with, but just to show the world they can.

Platforming to the top

A great way to start learning game mechanics, is by developing a simple platformer. You can walk and jump and shoot, those are the basics of gaming.... right?

The Return of Break-Out

A small game for a large mind

I taught myself coding by making small games, this one was the first of the bigger ones. I began by making a ame engine, with the help of LibGDX. This library has easy ways to add gravity to the game world and make game objects with a body that can collide with other bodies in the game. But I wanted to make it more challenging for myself, so I began making an engine so that I could use it in future games I might want to make. And for me to test my engine I made a break-out game. Simple blocks, that can be broken with a ball, that you need to bounce back with a paddle

GitHub Project

The Return of Break-Out can be played on windows and android

Big Ball Bonanza

Going crazy with ideas

Now that I made a tiny game engine, I could finally poop out all the game I wanted. There was one problem though: I could not focus on just one idea, so I put them all together, which made the game very hard to play. There are some bugs and it is hard to complete. That did not matter to me, because I made another step in coding evolution.

GitHub Project

Big Ball Bonanza can be played on windows and android

The Penis Mightier

Not suitable for a résumé

This period of development was a bit strange. I wanted to make something funny and weird and it became very strange and it might be upsetting to some. A game were you fight with your penis. Don't run away yet! It is quite good, if I say so myself. You pick a player, and start the game. Try do dodge the other men with penisses and try to push yours up against their head. It gets harder and harder as you go.... uhmm....the game gets harder and harder as you go. The point is, I looked better, it played better, it was overall better than my other games.

GitHub Project

The Penis Mightier can be played on windows

The Reflex

Moving into a 3D World

Unity has been mentioned by people who knew I was making games. So I began making a small game in Unity. I got introduced to Visual Studio for the first time, as well as C#. It went smooth. I had confidence in myself and with that I picked it up within a day. I surprised myself and made this game within a couple of days maybe. It isn't a big game and not very creative, but it is the next step in my development as a developer.

GitHub Project

The Reflex can be played on windows or right here!

Horde!

When in doubt, use Zombies

Unity worked out well, so I wanted to make a FPS game. A mini game, where I could test my coding skills to make a shooter. This took some time to figure out. The hard code was easily done, but the animations and the physics in a 3D world were a headache sometimes. But in the end, I could walk and jump. I could shoot zombies that spawned on different parts of the map. I even made bunnies hop all over the place.... because why not?

GitHub Project

The Reflex can be played on windows or right here!

Don't Shoot My Spaceship

The big kahuna

This is the big one, ladies and gentlemen. During the making of all these games, I went back and forth with this game. It began as a simple beginner project and now it is becoming my masterpiece. This game has it all, its own server engine, game engine and space engine. Manually crafted objects, behaviors, scenarios and events. It is a rpg-action-space-shooter, where you are a spaceship that can turn the world 360 degrees to dodge all kinds of enemies and obstacles, while doing quests, escorting damsels and flying through asteroid belts. All my knowledge and skills are interwoven within this game. It is not done, and it may never will be, but it brought me to this place of coding enlightenment and that can only be positive.

GitHub Project

Don't shoot my Spaceship can be played on windows
